titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles Gray, to James Dow, Officer in Charge of the Residency

mods.abstract: The letter concerns the raising of military finances in the Gulf. The letter enclosures a further letter from Lieutenant Price the Acting Paymaster (not included in the file) which, states Gray, is a request to the Residency to raise a loan for one lack of rupees, in Spanish dollars, German crowns, or new Persian rupees, whatever is the most favourable exchange.
